comment.author: 71087757@N00
comment._content:
From Wikipedia:
Ramblersville is a section of Howard Beach, in the New York City borough of Queens, bordered by 160th Avenue on the North, Hawtree Creek on the West, the New York City Subway's Rockaway Line on the East and the 102nd Street Creek on the South. 102nd Street crosses the Creek to reach Hamilton Beach at Russell Street.  

Wonderful image, I love the Happy Days sign!
